headline: Jim Cramer on Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (CFG): ‘Count Me In As A Believer In Citizens Financial’
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Jim Cramer’s Bold Predictions About These 10 Financial Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Citizens Financial Group, Inc.
